### ğŸ§¾ Commit Message Format

Each commit message **must start** with one of the following tags:

| Category         | Allowed Prefixes                                  |
|------------------|---------------------------------------------------|
| âœ¨ Features      | `[feat]`, `[feature]`                             |
| ğŸ› Bug Fixes     | `[fix]`, `[bugfix]`, `[hotfix]`                   |
| ğŸš€ Improvements  | `[improve]`, `[perf]`, `[refactor]`, `[optimize]` |
| ğŸ“š Documentation | `[docs]`, `[doc]`                                 |

âŒ Example of incorrect commit: `Added docs`  
âœ… Example of correct commit: `[docs] Added installation section`
